content.prompt: Which of the following is a similarity between Rable’s and Foner’s arguments in the excerpts?

choices.label: Both highlight the use of federal force to uphold the Constitution.
Both focus on many Southerners’ opposition to racial equality.
Both discuss congressional legislation to protect African American suffrage.
Both assert that Northerners cared little about the outcome of Reconstruction.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
